CustomField.description: A link to the Contact record associated with this potential duplicate record.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( '/' & SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__c, SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.FirstName & IF(SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.FirstName <> '', ' ', '' ) & SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.LastName, '_self') & IF( AND( SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.AccountId <> '', NOT( ISNULL( SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.AccountId ) ) ), ' at ' & HYPERLINK( '/' & SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.AccountId, SFSSDupeCatcher__Contact__r.Account.Name, '_self' ), '' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A link to the Contact record associated with this potential duplicate record.
CustomField.label: Contact Record
